title: Woman Walking Along the Insurgentes, Mexico City
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Edition on back, in pencil: [1/15  Woman walking along the
description: expressionless woman with long dark wavy hair and bangs, wearing a blouse with a striped Op-Art print, next to signs at left under a striped awning; pedestrians on city street at right
